page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content:
Two B{roads}cross in the Village. The B4086 runs from Stratford to Banbury and the B4451 from Southam to the Fosse Way at Halford. The busiest road according to our traffic cencus was the B4086. Peak traffic coincides with work hours and school hours when up to 20 buses bring children into the local Secondary school. During these times there is a School Crossing Patrol (lolly-pop) in Southam Street.
There is{concern}that the construction of the{M40 motorway}with an access point at Gaydon will increase traffic flow through Kineton in the near future.
